name: One For 1
description:
One For 1 is a game made for the Boundless Game Jam. The theme for the Jam was "One Button" so naturally go for one button control so everything is set by the left mouse button.

-There's a fish named Axo and he goes to your cursor when you left click

-There's a button named One when you hold left mouse on him and drag he will move too

Look at the How To Play in the menu to see all the things.
